Detailed Description

Basic model for every openGL object in scene (wormhole, ufo, etc.).

This object supplies 2 virtual functions for its descendants. One for just creating display list and second for making object by parsing obj file. This so called parsing will be achieved by creating and using cObj2OGL instance.
